text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump New week, same bullshit. Bollocks. They lie "you don't neeeed a mask, sheeple!" while they hoard a bunch for WH staff. tRUmp never used the one power he had, to force companies to MAKE things like masks. Not just for hospitals; everyone needs 'em. Nada. #COVID19 https://t.co/A3KpyUdEVH
